tutorial.evaluation_step1_desc: FACE 5 MORAL DILEMMAS. EVALUATION ACROSS 6 VALUES: EMPATHY, INTEGRITY, RESPONSIBILITY, JUSTICE, ALTRUISM, HONESTY.
tutorial.evaluation_step2_desc: READ EACH DILEMMA. CHOOSE BETWEEN TWO OPTIONS. NO RIGHT ANSWERS. ONLY REFLECTIONS OF YOUR MORAL VALUES.
tutorial.evaluation_step3_desc: AFTER YOUR CHOICE, SEE HOW OTHERS RESPONDED. COMPARE YOUR MORAL REASONING WITH THE COMMUNITY.
tutorial.evaluation_step4_desc: AFTER 5 DILEMMAS, VIEW YOUR MORAL PROFILE. SEE WHICH VALUES GUIDE YOUR DECISION-MAKING.
tutorial.infinite_step1_desc: ENDLESS AI-GENERATED MORAL DILEMMAS. EACH ONE UNIQUE. CHALLENGES YOUR ETHICS IN COMPLEX SITUATIONS.
tutorial.infinite_step2_desc: SUMMON NEW ETHICAL SCENARIOS POWERED BY AI. EACH ONE DIFFERENT. EACH ONE DARKER.
tutorial.infinite_step3_desc: SELECT BETWEEN TWO MORALLY CHALLENGING OPTIONS. RECEIVE RESPONSE THAT REFLECTS ON YOUR DECISION.
tutorial.infinite_step4_desc: KEEP GENERATING DILEMMAS. EXPLORE ETHICAL PERSPECTIVES. AS LONG AS YOU CAN ENDURE.
